title: material
description: The material appearance of a primitive.

baseColorFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The RGBA components of the base color (RGB) of the material. The fourth component (A) is the opacity of the material.

baseColorTexture.description: The index of the base color texture.

baseColorTexCoord.description: The set index of the base color texture's TEXCOORD attribute to be used for texture coordinate mapping.

metallicFactor.description: The metallic-ness the material (1 for metals, 0 for non-metals).

roughnessFactor.description: The perceptual roughness of the material surface (1 for rough, 0 for smooth)..

metallicRoughnessTexture.description: The index of the metallic-roughness texture.

metallicRoughnessTexCoord.description: The set index of the metallic-roughness texture's TEXCOORD attribute to be used for texture coordinate mapping.

normalTexture.description: The index the texture containing the normal map.

normalTexCoord.description: The set index of normalTexture's TEXCOORD attribute to be used for texture coordinate mapping

normalScale.description: The scalar multiplier applied to each normal vector of the texture.

occlusionTexture.description: The index the texture containing the occlusion map.

occlusionTexCoord.description: The set index of occlusionTexture's TEXCOORD attribute to be used for texture coordinate mapping

occlusionStrength.description: A scalar multiplier controlling the amount of occlusion applied. A value of 0 means no occlusion; 1.0 means full occlusion.

emmissionTexture.description: The index the texture containing the emission map.

emmissionTexCoord.description: The set index of emmissionTexture's TEXCOORD attribute to be used for texture coordinate mapping

emmissionStrength.description: The RGB components of the emissive color of the material. If an emission texture is specified, this value is multiplied with the texel values.
